column1: NOTES: Each cell presents the coefficient from a 2SLS regression of standardised educational attainment on fertility.  2+, 3+ and 4+ refer to the birth orders of children included in the regression.  For a full description of these groups see tables 5, 6 and 12.  Each regression includes full controls including maternal health and socioeconomic variables.  The sample is made up of all children aged between 6-18 years from families in the DHS who fulfill birth order and gender requirements indicated in the header.  Standard errors are clustered by mother.* p<0.1, ** p<0.05, *** p<0.01
